RelatedSentence: BAGHDAD : Militants kidnapped an Iraqi candidate yesterday as attacks in Baghdad and northern Iraq killed nine people and officials prepared to announce the results of last month 's election .

BAGHDAD : Militants kidnapped an Iraqi candidate yesterday as attacks in Baghdad and northern Iraq killed nine people and officials prepared to announce the results of last month 's election .
The latest unrest is part of a year - long surge in bloodshed that has fuelled fears Iraq is slipping back into the all - out sectarian conflict that left tens of thousands dead in 2006 and 2007 .
